body: The Happy Land Social Club. The Zodiac. The Brian Watkins slaying. Livery-cab killings. Children cut down by stray gunfire. title: Record Year For Killings Jolts Officials In New York

body: The mundane and sometimes grim task of keeping New York City going on Christmas fell to an eclectic group of men and women, some of whom kept the holiday in their own way and some of whom did not. title: It's Another Day in the City, But Not Just Another Day

body: The Bedford-Stuyvesant Volunteer Ambulance Corps officially began on Feb. 23, 1989.
